name: MusicSubscriptionOffer
desc: A type for grouping other types for showing subscription offers for Apple Music.

items.name: struct Action
items.desc: A representation of the entry point for the sheet with subscription offers for Apple Music.

items.name: struct MessageIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier for the main message that the subscription offer sheet presents to the user.

items.name: struct Options
items.desc: Options for loading subscription offers for Apple Music.
